title: Contemporary 5 Bedroom Ultra Luxury Villa in Bangpor
description:
Key Features
•	5 Bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms
•	Stunning Panoramic views of the island
•	Cutting edge architecture
•	Sunken seating area & sala
•	Dining area with drinks bar
•	Infinity edge swimming pool
•	Large fully equipped kitchen
•	Powder room
•	AV room with satellite TV
•	Wifi, sound system and ipod dock
•	Lush tropical gardens
•	Table tennis & badminton
•	Private Garage
•	Freehold Tenure
•	Chanote Title
